description:
COMFORT STARTS WITH A COOLER NIGHT SLEEP: The Novilla Queen mattress is constructed with a breathable combination. The outside of bed cover is infused with bamboo charcoal fiber to help dissipate excess heat emitted by your body. The interior uses gel memory foam and egg foam to enhance airflow within the memory foam mattress, ensuring you stay comfortably cool all night.
PAIN RELIEF & WAKING UP REFRESHED: The 4-layer foam design of the mattress helps relieve pain and improve sleep quality. As you lie on the queen memory foam mattress, the gel-infused foam layer contours to your body, providing relief around pressure points such as hips and shoulders. Simultaneously, the comfort layer enhances foam mattress's bounce, preventing sinking while you sleep.
SUPPORTIVE & MOTION ISOLATION: The queen size mattress offers solid support in every position. Even if you sleep on the edge of the bed, it will not slip. The high-density foam provides proper spinal alignment and effectively absorbs motion, making it an excellent fit for couples or anyone who is easily disturbed by movement on the queen foam mattress.
QUEEN MATTRESS IN A BOX: The 12 inch mattress is compressed and delivered in a box, allowing for convenient delivery wherever you need it. It is recommended to wait for at least 72 hours to allow the mattress to fully expand to its original size. The memory foam used in the mattress is CertiPUR-US certified and odor-free, ensuring a healthy sleeping environment for you to enjoy.
RELIABLE CUSTOMER CARE TEAM: Our goal is to provide you with professional and reliable after-sales service. We offer a 10-year warranty policy and a 100-day free trial sleep period for the queen mattress you purchase. If you are not satisfied, please feel free to provide us with feedback, and we will respond to you promptly upon receiving the information.
